summary: This document appears to be a collection of American Airlines flight records and passenger name records (PNRs) produced in response to a grand jury subpoena dated January 23, 2010. The records detail specific flights booked for Ghislaine Maxwell in 2019, including passenger information, ticket details, and booking remarks.

persons.name: Alex Rossmiller
persons.context: Signed the grand jury subpoena dated January 23, 2010, which requested the business records provided in this document.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Appears as a passenger on multiple American Airlines flights in 2019. Her full name, address, and frequent flyer information are listed in the booking records.

persons.name: Leah Saffian
persons.context: Appears as a passenger on a flight itinerary from July 2019, booked alongside Ghislaine Maxwell. Her name and address are listed.

connections.description: Booked on the same flight itinerary (BAWNL) for travel on July 19, 2019, from Manchester, NH (MHT) to Los Angeles, CA (LAX) via Charlotte, NC (CLT).
As an AUSA, Rossmiller signed the subpoena that compelled the production of flight records pertaining to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: Assistant United States Attorney Alex Rossmiller signs a grand jury subpoena requesting specified business records.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Flight from LAX to MHT
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell flies from Los Angeles (LAX) to Manchester, NH (MHT) via Philadelphia (PHL) on American Airlines flights AA 814 and AA 5003.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell and Leah Saffian Flight from MHT to LAX
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell and Leah Saffian fly from Manchester, NH (MHT) to Los Angeles (LAX) via Charlotte, NC (CLT) on American Airlines flights AA 5675 and AA 812.

locations: 139 A Charles St Apt 233, Boston, MA 02114 (listed for Ghislaine Maxwell)
5640 Encino Ave, Encino, CA 91436 (listed for Leah Saffian)
keyFacts: Flight records for Ghislaine Maxwell were obtained via a federal grand jury subpoena signed by AUSA Alex Rossmiller in January 2010.
Records show Ghislaine Maxwell booked a flight from Los Angeles to Manchester, New Hampshire, in August 2019.
Records show Ghislaine Maxwell and Leah Saffian were booked together on a flight from Manchester, NH, to Los Angeles in July 2019.
The document includes detailed Passenger Name Records (PNRs) with remarks, payment information, and seat assignments.
The records indicate the PNRs were "purged" shortly after the travel dates, but historical ticket data was retained.
